1372: Hugheman was born in Marcktgang in 1372.
1380: Lost mother at the age of 8.
Laurens took care of Hugheman since Hugheman was 9.
1383: Lost father at the age of 11.
Became caretaker of Walwin, Suaneka, Wederic, Willibrando at age 12.
1391: Got married to Thedwi at age 20 in 1391.
Hugheman moved to Verckens merct.B.3 after marriage.
1392: Lost son Hugheman when Hugheman was 0 years old.
Thedwi gave birth to their stillborn son Hugheman in 1392.
1393: Had a daughter with Thedwi, Hadewigis, at age 21.
Lost daughter Hadewigis when Hadewigis was 1 years old.
1397: Had a son with Thedwi, Clarebout, at age 25.
Lost son Clarebout when Clarebout was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
